import React,{useState} from 'react' import {Form,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {saveShippingAddress} from '../actions/cartAction' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const ShippingScreen = ({history}) => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const cart=useSelector(state=>state.cart) const {shippingAddress}=cart const [address,setAddress]=useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city,setCity]=useState(shippingAddress.city) const [postalCode,setPostalCode]=useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [country,setCountry]=useState(shippingAddress.country) const submitHandler=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); dispatch(saveShippingAddress({address,city,postalCode,country})) history.push('/payment') } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)}> City setCity(e.target.value)}> Postal Code setPostalCode(e.target.value)}> Country setCountry(e.target.value)}>
) } export default ShippingScreen
